Text.Page:
We need to send a message to our enemies.

Eliminate the {@LinkCreature:12#7#gula brawlers}, {@LinkCreature:12#8#Red Lash killers} and {@LinkCreature:12#9#butchers}, and {@LinkCreature:12#11#island kamaras}.

Report to Munam at the Vindicator Basecamp when you've finished.
Keep up the good work, <PCCLASS:lcase>. For the federation!
You have not eliminated enough foes to complete this mission.
